backend/main.mo: Defines data types and maps for user profiles, bookings, products, inquiries, and payments with authorization and helper methods for ID generation and access checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, utilities, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up favicon, root div, and loading main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthModal.t: Authentication modal handling Internet Identity login, Google info option, profile state, and navigation shortcuts.
Component protecting admin-only content by checking owner auth and showing denial or loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to submit basic profile details and trigger profile creation.
Layout wrapper rendering header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright, branding, and an external link with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with links, mobile menu, auth modal, and admin dashboard access based on identity and admin status.
frontend/src/data/hotelReviews.ts: Exports static hotel review data plus helper functions to compute average ratings and room-type-specific ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerAuth.ts: Checks whether the current actor is an admin and exposes admin status with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerRecords.ts: Defines queries for fetching all ownerâ€‘level records such as bookings, orders, inquiries, and payments via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains user-facing data queries and mutations for profiles, hotel, cab, acting driver, and store interactions using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file setting design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and custom utility classes for overlays and backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/ActingDriverBookingPa: Provides a form for requesting an acting driver, handles validation, submission, and displays a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/CabBookingPage.tsx: Allows users to select cab types, enter trip details, book a cab, and view a confirmation after successful booking.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerCarePage.tsx: Lets users submit customer care inquiries with contact info and shows a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and service cards linking to hotel, cab, driver, and store pages.
frontend/src/pages/HotelBookingPage.tsx: Enables hotel room booking with date selection, price calculation, booking submission, and confirmation display.
frontend/src/pages/HotelReviewsPage.tsx: Displays aggregated hotel review ratings and a list of individual guest reviews with navigation back to the hotel page.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Displays user's sales orders with options to update dates or cancel orders, handling authentication and status display.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboardPage.ts: Shows an owner dashboard with stats, recent activity, and tabbed views using data from multiple booking and order sources.
Allows users to submit payment records and view past payments with basic validation and confirmation flow.
frontend/src/pages/SalesStorePage.tsx: Implements a sample product store with cart management, checkout steps, and sales order creation.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Provides a Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, quantity updates, and total price calculation.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting dates, datetimes, currency, and converting between dates and nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and managing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature versions for the Travel Break app.
